mapper.select: select TASKID, ID, XINGMING, JUNRENBZH, RENYUANLBM, ZHIWUDJM, JUNXIANDJM, JUNBINGZMC, SHENGAO, XIONGWEI, YAOWEI, TOUWEI, JIAOCHANG, ZHIWEI, QIHOUQ, SHUJUSZDW, SHANGBAOBZ, DANWEIDM, DAORUSJ, SUOSUDWDM, BUMENMC from bzfx.TASK_BZK_SLGX_BZ_BZDAXX where TASKID = #{taskid}

select TASKID, ID, XINGMING, JUNRENBZH, RENYUANLBM, ZHIWUDJM, JUNXIANDJM, JUNBINGZMC, SHENGAO, XIONGWEI, YAOWEI, TOUWEI, JIAOCHANG, ZHIWEI, QIHOUQ, SHUJUSZDW, SHANGBAOBZ, DANWEIDM, DAORUSJ, SUOSUDWDM, BUMENMC from bzfx.TASK_BZK_SLGX_BZ_BZDAXX limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into bzfx.TASK_BZK_SLGX_BZ_BZDAXX(XINGMING, JUNRENBZH, RENYUANLBM, ZHIWUDJM, JUNXIANDJM, JUNBINGZMC, SHENGAO, XIONGWEI, YAOWEI, TOUWEI, JIAOCHANG, ZHIWEI, QIHOUQ, SHUJUSZDW, SHANGBAOBZ, DANWEIDM, DAORUSJ, SUOSUDWDM, BUMENMC) values (#{xingming}, #{junrenbzh}, #{renyuanlbm}, #{zhiwudjm}, #{junxiandjm}, #{junbingzmc}, #{shengao}, #{xiongwei}, #{yaowei}, #{touwei}, #{jiaochang}, #{zhiwei}, #{qihouq}, #{shujuszdw}, #{shangbaobz}, #{danweidm}, #{daorusj}, #{suosudwdm}, #{bumenmc})

insert ignore into bzfx.TASK_BZK_SLGX_BZ_BZDAXX(ID, XINGMING, JUNRENBZH, RENYUANLBM, ZHIWUDJM, JUNXIANDJM, JUNBINGZMC, SHENGAO, XIONGWEI, YAOWEI, TOUWEI, JIAOCHANG, ZHIWEI, QIHOUQ, SHUJUSZDW, SHANGBAOBZ, DANWEIDM, DAORUSJ, SUOSUDWDM, BUMENMC) values (#{id}, #{xingming}, #{junrenbzh}, #{renyuanlbm}, #{zhiwudjm}, #{junxiandjm}, #{junbingzmc}, #{shengao}, #{xiongwei}, #{yaowei}, #{touwei}, #{jiaochang}, #{zhiwei}, #{qihouq}, #{shujuszdw}, #{shangbaobz}, #{danweidm}, #{daorusj}, #{suosudwdm}, #{bumenmc})
mapper.update:
update bzfx.TASK_BZK_SLGX_BZ_BZDAXX
XINGMING = #{xingming},
JUNRENBZH = #{junrenbzh},
RENYUANLBM = #{renyuanlbm},
ZHIWUDJM = #{zhiwudjm},
JUNXIANDJM = #{junxiandjm},
JUNBINGZMC = #{junbingzmc},
SHENGAO = #{shengao},
XIONGWEI = #{xiongwei},
YAOWEI = #{yaowei},
TOUWEI = #{touwei},
JIAOCHANG = #{jiaochang},
ZHIWEI = #{zhiwei},
QIHOUQ = #{qihouq},
SHUJUSZDW = #{shujuszdw},
SHANGBAOBZ = #{shangbaobz},
DANWEIDM = #{danweidm},
DAORUSJ = #{daorusj},
SUOSUDWDM = #{suosudwdm},
BUMENMC = #{bumenmc},
where TASKID = #{taskid}
mapper.select: select ${field},count(1) c from bzfx.TASK_BZK_SLGX_BZ_BZDAXX group by ${field}
